text: San Marcos is a city in San Diego County, California, United States. It has a population of 94,833 people, as of 2020. The city was incorporated on January 28, 1963. == Climate == San Marcos has a Mediterranean climate with hot and dry summers and mild winters. The highest temperature ever recorded in San Marcos was 112 Â°F on July 22, 2006. == Other websites == * Official website == References == Category:Cities in California Category:Settlements in San Diego County, California Category:1963 establishments in California
title: San Marcos, California
